TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Interlocked extends System.Object
public ref class Interlocked abstract sealed

summary.span: 為多重執行緒共用的變數提供不可部分完成的作業 (Atomic Operation)。

span.span: Provides atomic operations for variables that are shared by multiple threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的方法來協助防止當排程器會切換內容，直到有執行緒在更新的變數，可由其他執行緒，或在不同的處理器上同時執行兩個執行緒可能會發生的錯誤。The methods of this class help protect against errors that can occur when the scheduler switches contexts while a thread is updating a variable that can be accessed by other threads, or when two threads are executing concurrently on separate processors. 這個類別的成員不會擲回例外狀況。The members of this class do not throw exceptions. 和方法遞增或遞減變數，並將產生的值儲存在單一作業。The and methods increment or decrement a variable and store the resulting value in a single operation. 在大部分的電腦上遞增變數不是不可部分完成的作業，需要下列步驟：On most computers, incrementing a variable is not an atomic operation, requiring the following steps: 1. 將值從執行個體變數載入暫存器。Load a value from an instance variable into a register. 2. 遞增或遞減的值。Increment or decrement the value. 3. 將值儲存在執行個體變數。Store the value in the instance variable. 如果您不要使用和，執行緒可以在執行前兩個步驟之後被優先佔用。If you do not use and , a thread can be preempted after executing the first two steps. 接著，另一個執行緒可執行所有的三個步驟。Another thread can then execute all three steps. 當第一個執行緒繼續執行時，它會覆寫執行個體變數中的值，而且遞增或遞減的第二個執行緒所執行的效果會遺失。When the first thread resumes execution, it overwrites the value in the instance variable, and the effect of the increment or decrement performed by the second thread is lost. 方法以不可分割方式將整數值新增至整數變數，並傳回新的變數值。The method atomically adds an integer value to an integer variable and returns the new value of the variable. 方法會以不可分割方式交換指定變數的值。The method atomically exchanges the values of the specified variables. 方法結合了兩項作業： 比較兩個值，並儲存第三個值其中一個變數，並根據比較結果。The method combines two operations: comparing two values and storing a third value in one of the variables, based on the outcome of the comparison. 比較和交換作業成為不可部分完成的作業。The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation. 請確定任何寫入或讀取權限共用的變數是不可部分完成。Ensure that any write or read access to a shared variable is atomic. 否則，資料可能會損毀，或載入的值可能不正確。Otherwise, the data might be corrupted or the loaded value might be incorrect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範具備執行緒安全資源的鎖定機制。The following code example shows a thread-safe resource locking mechanism. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange Int32 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange Int32 Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange Int32 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange Int32 Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange Int32 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange Int32 Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將兩個整數相加，並以總和取代第一個整數，成為不可部分完成的作業。

span.span: Adds two integers and replaces the first integer with the sum, as an atomic operation.

summary.span: 將兩個 32 位元整數加相，並以總和取代第一個整數，成為不可部分完成的作業。

span.span: Adds two 32-bit integers and replaces the first integer with the sum, as an atomic operation.
The new value stored at .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會藉由包裝來處理溢位狀況： 如果處的值`location1`是並`value`為 1，結果是; 如果`value`為 2，則結果為 ( + 1); 等等。This method handles an overflow condition by wrapping: if the value at `location1` is and `value` is 1, the result is ; if `value` is 2, the result is ( + 1); and so on. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown.

summary.span: 比較兩個值是否相等，如果相等，則取代第一個值。

span.span: Compares two values for equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first value.

MemberSignature.Value: public static double CompareExchange (ref double location1, double value, double comparand);
.method public static hidebysig float64 CompareExchange(float64& location1, float64 value, float64 comparand) cil managed
Public Shared Function CompareExchange (ByRef location1 As Double, value As Double, comparand As Double) As Double
public: static double CompareExchange(double % location1, double value, double comparand);
static member CompareExchange : * double * double -> double

param.name: location1
param.span: 目的端，其值會與「比較元」進行比較且可能會被取代。

span.span: The destination, whose value is compared with comparand and possibly replaced.

param.name: value
param.span: 當比較的結果相等時，會取代目的端值的值。

span.span: The value that replaces the destination value if the comparison results in equality.

param.name: comparand
param.span: 與 location1 的值比較的值。

span.span: The value that is compared to the value at location1.

summary.span: 比較兩個雙精確度浮點數是否相等；如果相等，則取代第一個值。

span.span: Compares two double-precision floating point numbers for equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first value.
The original value in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparand`中的值`location1`相等，則`value`會儲存在`location1`。If `comparand` and the value in `location1` are equal, then `value` is stored in `location1`. 否則，不會執行任何作業。Otherwise, no operation is performed. 比較和交換作業成為不可部分完成的作業。The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation. 傳回值是中的原始值`location1`無論交換發生。The return value of is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範會累積的累計值的安全執行緒方法值。The following code example demonstrates a thread-safe method that accumulates a running total of values. 兩個執行緒新增一系列的值 使用安全執行緒方法和一般的加法，和當執行緒完成時，會比較總計。Two threads add a series of values using the thread-safe method and ordinary addition, and when the threads complete the totals are compared. 雙處理器的電腦上，沒有顯著的差異總計。On a dual-processor computer, there is a significant difference in the totals. 在使用安全執行緒方法時，會儲存計算加總的初始值，然後方法用來交換新計算的總和，最舊的總計。In the thread-safe method, the initial value of the running total is saved, and then the method is used to exchange the newly computed total with the old total. 如果傳回的值不等於儲存的值的加總，然後另一個執行緒已經更新總同時。If the return value is not equal to the saved value of the running total, then another thread has updated the total in the meantime. 在此情況下，您必須重複嘗試更新計算加總。In that case, the attempt to update the running total must be repeated. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange Double#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange Double/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange Double#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange Double/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Compares two 32-bit signed integers for equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first value.
The original value in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparand`中的值`location1`相等，則`value`會儲存在`location1`。If `comparand` and the value in `location1` are equal, then `value` is stored in `location1`. 否則，不會執行任何作業。Otherwise, no operation is performed. 比較和交換作業成為不可部分完成的作業。The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation. 傳回值是中的原始值`location1`無論交換發生。The return value of is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範會加總累積的安全執行緒的方法。The following code example demonstrates a thread-safe method that accumulates a running total. 計算加總的初始值會儲存，然後方法用來交換新計算的總和，最舊的總計。The initial value of the running total is saved, and then the method is used to exchange the newly computed total with the old total. 如果傳回的值不等於儲存的值的加總，然後另一個執行緒已經更新總同時。If the return value is not equal to the saved value of the running total, then another thread has updated the total in the meantime. 在此情況下，您必須重複嘗試更新計算加總。In that case, the attempt to update the running total must be repeated. > [!NOTE] > 的.NET Framework 2.0 版中引入的方法提供更便利的方式，累積安全執行緒累計總數的整數。The method, introduced in version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, provides a more convenient way to accumulate thread-safe running totals for integers. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange0#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange0/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange0#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange0/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange0#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange0/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparand`中的值`location1`相等，則`value`會儲存在`location1`。If `comparand` and the value in `location1` are equal, then `value` is stored in `location1`. 否則，不會執行任何作業。Otherwise, no operation is performed. 比較和交換作業成為不可部分完成的作業。The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation. 這個方法的傳回值是中的原始值`location1`無論交換發生。The return value of this method is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place. > [!NOTE] > 是特定平台類型。 is a platform-specific type.

span.span: The destination object that is compared by reference with comparand and possibly replaced.

span.span: The object that replaces the destination object if the reference comparison results in equality.

param.span: 以傳址方式與 location1 的物件進行比較的物件。

summary.span: 比較兩個物件的參考是否相等；如果相等，則取代第一個物件。

span.span: Compares two objects for reference equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first object.
The original value in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 從.NET Framework 2.0，方法多載參考型別提供型別安全的替代方法。Beginning with .NET Framework 2.0, the method overload provides a type-safe alternative for reference types. 我們建議您呼叫它而不是這個多載。We recommend that you call it instead of this overload. 如果`comparand`和中的物件`location1`上是相等的參考，然後`value`會儲存在`location1`。If `comparand` and the object in `location1` are equal by reference, then `value` is stored in `location1`. 否則，不會執行任何作業。Otherwise, no operation is performed. 比較和交換作業成為不可部分完成的作業。The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation. 傳回值是中的原始值`location1`無論交換發生。The return value of is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place. > [!NOTE] > 參考相等，而不是實值相等比較的物件。The objects are compared for reference equality rather than value equality. 如此一來，兩個經過 boxing 處理的執行個體相同的實值型別 （例如，整數值 3） 永遠看起來是不相等，而且會執行任何作業。As a result, two boxed instances of the same value type (for example, the integer 3) always appear to be unequal and no operation is performed. 請勿使用這個多載具有實值類型。Do not use this overload with value types.

span.span: Compares two single-precision floating point numbers for equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first value.
The original value in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparand`中的值`location1`相等，則`value`會儲存在`location1`。If `comparand` and the value in `location1` are equal, then `value` is stored in `location1`. 否則，不會執行任何作業。Otherwise, no operation is performed. 比較和交換作業成為不可部分完成的作業。The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation. 傳回值是中的原始值`location1`無論交換發生。The return value of is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範會累積的累計值的安全執行緒方法值。The following code example demonstrates a thread-safe method that accumulates a running total of values. 兩個執行緒新增一系列的值 使用安全執行緒方法和一般的加法，和當執行緒完成時，會比較總計。Two threads add a series of values using the thread-safe method and ordinary addition, and when the threads complete the totals are compared. 雙處理器的電腦上，沒有顯著的差異總計。On a dual-processor computer, there is a significant difference in the totals. 在使用安全執行緒方法時，會儲存計算加總的初始值，然後方法用來交換新計算的總和，最舊的總計。In the thread-safe method, the initial value of the running total is saved, and then the method is used to exchange the newly computed total with the old total. 如果傳回的值不等於儲存的值的加總，然後另一個執行緒已經更新總同時。If the return value is not equal to the saved value of the running total, then another thread has updated the total in the meantime. 在此情況下，您必須重複嘗試更新計算加總。In that case, the attempt to update the running total must be repeated. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange Single#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange Single/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange Single#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.Interlocked CompareExchange Single/vb/source.vb#1)]

static member CompareExchange : * 'T * 'T -> 'T (requires 'T : null)

span.span: This type must be a reference type.

param.name: location1
param.span: 以傳址方式與 comparand 比較的目的地值，且可能被取代。

span.span: The destination, whose value is compared by reference with comparand and possibly replaced.

param.span: 此為參考參數 (在 C# 中為 ，在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: This is a reference parameter ( in C#, in Visual Basic).

param.name: value
param.span: 當以傳址方式比較的結果相等時，會取代目的地的值。

span.span: The value that replaces the destination value if the comparison by reference results in equality.

param.name: comparand
param.span: 以傳址方式與 location1 值比較的值。

span.span: The value that is compared by reference to the value at location1.

summary.span: 比較指定參考型別 的兩個執行個體是否參考相等；如果相等，則取代第一個。

span.span: Compares two instances of the specified reference type for reference equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first one.
The original value in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`comparand`中的值`location1`上是相等的參考，然後`value`會儲存在`location1`。If `comparand` and the value in `location1` are equal by reference, then `value` is stored in `location1`. 否則，不會執行任何作業。Otherwise, no operation is performed. 比較和交換將會以不可部分完成的作業。The comparison and the exchange are performed as an atomic operation. 這個方法的傳回值是中的原始值`location1`無論交換發生。The return value of this method is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place. 這個方法只支援參考型別。This method only supports reference types. 有多載方法，實值型別， ， ， ，和，但不支援其他實值型別。There are overloads of the method for the value types , , , , and , but there is no support for other value types. > [!NOTE] > 最好是使用這個方法多載方法多載，因為後者需要要存取晚期繫結的目的地物件。This method overload is preferable to the method overload, because the latter requires the destination object to be accessed late-bound.

static member Decrement : -> int

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: location
param.span: 值會被遞減的變數。

span.span: The variable whose value is to be decremented.

summary.span: 遞減特定變數並將結果儲存起來，成為不可部分完成的作業。

span.span: Decrements a specified variable and stores the result, as an atomic operation.
The decremented value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會藉由包裝來處理溢位狀況： 如果`location` = ， `location` -1 = 。This method handles an overflow condition by wrapping: If `location` = , `location` - 1 = . 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷多少的隨機數字，範圍從 0 到 1000，才能產生 1,000 的隨機數字的中點值。The following example determines how many random numbers that range from 0 to 1,000 are required to generate 1,000 random numbers with a midpoint value. 若要追蹤的中點值，變數中，數`midpointCount`，是亂數產生器傳回中點值，每次設定等於 1,000 和遞減。To keep track of the number of midpoint values, a variable, `midpointCount`, is set equal to 1,000 and decremented each time the random number generator returns a midpoint value. 有三個執行緒產生隨機的數字，因為方法會呼叫以確保多個執行緒未更新`midpointCount`同時。Because three threads generate the random numbers, the method is called to ensure that multiple threads don't update `midpointCount` concurrently. 請注意，鎖定也會用來保護隨機號碼產生器，而且物件用來確保`Main`方法未完成執行前三個執行緒。Note that a lock is also used to protect the random number generator, and that a object is used to ensure that the `Main` method doesn't finish execution before the three threads. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.interlocked.decrement/cs/decrement1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.interlocked.decrement/vb/decrement1.vb#1)] 下列範例是類似於前一個位置，不同之處在於它會使用類別而不是執行緒程序來產生隨機的中點 50,000 的整數。The following example is similar to the previous one, except that it uses the class instead of a thread procedure to generate 50,000 random midpoint integers. 在此範例中，lambda 運算式來取代`GenerateNumbers`執行緒程序，並呼叫方法就不需要物件。In this example, a lambda expression replaces the `GenerateNumbers` thread procedure, and the call to the method eliminates the need for the object. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.interlocked.decrement/cs/decrement2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.interlocked.decrement/vb/decrement2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會藉由包裝來處理溢位狀況： 如果`location` = ， `location` + 1 = 。This method handles an overflow condition by wrapping: if `location` = , `location` + 1 = . 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷多少的隨機數字，範圍從 0 到 1000，才能產生 1,000 的隨機數字的中點值。The following example determines how many random numbers that range from 0 to 1,000 are required to generate 1,000 random numbers with a midpoint value. 若要追蹤的中點值，變數中，數`midpointCount`設定為等於 0，是亂數產生器傳回中點值，直到達到 10,000 每次遞增。To keep track of the number of midpoint values, a variable, `midpointCount`, is set equal to 0 and incremented each time the random number generator returns a midpoint value until it reaches 10,000. 有三個執行緒產生隨機的數字，因為方法會呼叫以確保多個執行緒未更新`midpointCount`同時。Because three threads generate the random numbers, the method is called to ensure that multiple threads don't update `midpointCount` concurrently. 請注意，鎖定也會用來保護隨機號碼產生器，而且物件用來確保`Main`方法未完成執行前三個執行緒。Note that a lock is also used to protect the random number generator, and that a object is used to ensure that the `Main` method doesn't finish execution before the three threads. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.interlocked.increment2/cs/increment3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.interlocked.increment2/vb/Increment3.vb#3)] 下列範例是類似於前一個位置，不同之處在於它會使用類別而不是執行緒程序來產生隨機的中點 50,000 的整數。The following example is similar to the previous one, except that it uses the class instead of a thread procedure to generate 50,000 random midpoint integers. 在此範例中，lambda 運算式來取代`GenerateNumbers`執行緒程序，並呼叫方法就不需要物件。In this example, a lambda expression replaces the `GenerateNumbers` thread procedure, and the call to the method eliminates the need for the object. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment2#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.interlocked.increment2/cs/increment4.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment2#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.interlocked.increment2/vb/Increment4.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會藉由包裝來處理溢位狀況： 如果`location` = ， `location` + 1 = 。This method handles an overflow condition by wrapping: if `location` = , `location` + 1 = . 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 同步處理記憶體存取，如下所示：執行目前執行緒的處理器無法以下列方式重新排列指示：呼叫 之前的記憶體存取在呼叫 後的記憶體存取之後執行。

span.span: Synchronizes memory access as follows: The processor that executes the current thread cannot reorder instructions in such a way that memory accesses before the call to execute after memory accesses that follow the call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法加入至類別內[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]為求方便; 它是包裝函式方法。This method was added to the class in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] as a convenience; it's a wrapper for the method. 只能在具有弱式記憶體順序 （例如，採用多個 Intel Itanium 處理器的系統） 的多處理器系統上需要。 is required only on multiprocessor systems that have weak memory ordering (for example, a system that employs multiple Intel Itanium processors). 大部分的用途而言，C#`lock`陳述式，Visual Basic`SyncLock`陳述式，或類別提供簡單的方式同步處理資料。For most purposes, the C# `lock` statement, the Visual Basic `SyncLock` statement, or the class provide easier ways to synchronize data.

param.span: 要載入的 64 位元值。

span.span: The 64-bit value to be loaded.

summary.span: 傳回 64 位元的值 (載入為不可部分完成的作業)。

span.span: Returns a 64-bit value, loaded as an atomic operation.
The loaded value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是在 64 位元系統上沒有必要的因為 64 位元讀取的作業已經是不可部分完成。The method is unnecessary on 64-bit systems, because 64-bit read operations are already atomic. 32 位元系統上，64 位元讀取的作業不是不可部分完成，除非使用執行。On 32-bit systems, 64-bit read operations are not atomic unless performed using .
